    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030705</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030705</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Reino Hongos</string>
            <string language="en">The fungi kingdom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Pilzkönigreich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le royaume de mycètes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O reino dos fungos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il regno dei funghi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το βασίλειο μυκήτων</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se tratan las características de los hongos, la distinción entre hongos unicelulares y pluricelulares, los grupos más representativos de los Hongos y las partes de una seta.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic dealing with the characteristics of fungi, the distinction between unicellular and multicellular fungi, the most representative groups of fungi and the parts of a mushroom.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Hongos</string>
            <string language="en">Fungi kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das die Eigenschaften der Pilze, die 
Unterscheidung zwischen den einzelligen und mehrzelligen Pilzen, den 
repräsentativgruppen der Pilze und den Teilen eines Pilzes 
beschäftigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet traitant les caractéristiques des mycètes,
la distinction entre les mycètes unicellulaires et multicellulaires, 
les groupes de mycètes les plus représentatifs et les parties d'un 
champignon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que trata das características dos fungos,
a distinção entre fungos unicellular e multicellular, os grupos os 
mais representativos dos fungos e as partes de um cogumelo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che si occupa delle caratteristiche dei 
funghi, la distinzione fra i funghi unicellulari e multicellulari, i 
gruppi dei funghi più rappresentativi e le parti di un fungo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξετάζει τα χαρακτηριστικά των μυκήτων, η 
διάκριση μεταξύ των unicellular και multicellular μυκήτων, 
των αντιπροσωπευτικότερων ομάδων μυκήτων και των μερών ενός 
μανιταριού.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pilzkönigreich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Royaume de mycètes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reino dos fungos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regno dei funghi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιόσφαιρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασίλειο μυκήτων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
